overview:
Co-Founder and CTO of EngageSciences. Working to help companies create brilliant online campaigns through social media and build engaging experiences for customers.

Previously held a number of roles at Vignette including CTO Media and Chief Architect. Founded a new product line to focus on the Media & Entertainment vertical and lead Engineering and Product Management for this effort. Also part of the overall CTO team at Vignette setting technical direction for the company and taking part in M&A.

Earlier, lead the deployment of a number of consumer facing sites such as EA Games, Sky , Vodafone (Vizzavi), Barclays, Egg Credit Cards and Shell.

Worked at design agencies such as Wolff Olins and Shandwick Interactive in the early days of the web building out the first generation of sites and web applications.
